## DefaultApp.registerElement() method

API for developers to register [AppElements](./foundation-shell.appelement.md) lazily.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerElement(element: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | any | The [AppElement](./foundation-shell.appelement.md) to register. |
